issue.title: [Release] Don't use ENV environment variable
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16428](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16428). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
`ENV` is used for `sh`:

dash(1): 

> If the environment variable ENV is set on entry to an interactive shell, or is set in the .profile of a login shell, the shell next reads commands from the file named in ENV.

We should not use `ENV` in verification script.
